var a = null;
var b = null;

var a = null
var b = null;
foo: bar: do { break foo; } while (null);
foo: bar: do { break bar; } while (null);
foo: bar: do { continue foo; } while (null);
foo: bar: do { continue bar; } while (null);
for (var foo in x in y);
for (let foo in x in y);
foo: for(var x in y) { continue foo; }
foo: for(var x in y) { continue bar; }
foo: for(var x in y) { continue; }
for(var x in y) { continue foo; }
foo: for (;;) { bar: switch (null) { case null: continue foo; } }
foo: for (;;) { bar: switch (null) { case null: continue bar; } }
a * b + c + d * e * f + g;
var x = a * b + c + d * e * f + g;
a * b + c + d < e * f * g + h;
var x = a * b + c + d < e * f * g + h;
a * b + c * d - e * f + g * h - i * j;
var x = a * b + c * d - e * f + g * h - i * j;
var x = + - ! ~ typeof void delete y;
var x = new Thing(a, b, c);
function f() { return x in y; }
